methods.name: starkNet_displayPrivateKey
methods.summary: Extract private key from deployed Starknet account and display in MetaMask

params.name: userAddress
params.summary: Address of the account contract
params.description: Address of the account contract

params.name: chainId
params.summary: Id of the target Starknet network
params.description: Id of the target Starknet network (default to Starknet Goerli Testnet)

result.name: result
result.summary: Always be null for security reason
result.description: Always be null for security reason, the private key will only be shown on the pop-up

methods.name: starkNet_extractPublicKey

params.name: userAddress

params.description: Address of the account contract

params.name: chainId
params.summary: Id of the target Starknet network
params.description: Id of the target Starknet network (default to Starknet Goerli Testnet)

result.name: result
result.summary: Public key of the given account address
result.description: Public key of the given account address (can be different from the actual signer)

methods.name: starkNet_createAccount
methods.summary: Deploys an account contract

params.name: addressIndex
params.summary: Specific address index of the derived key in BIP-44
params.description: Specific address index of the derived key in BIP-44

params.name: deploy
params.summary: Indicate whether to send the deploy transaction for the account contract
params.description: Indicate whether to include send the deploy transaction for the account contract (default to false)

params.name: chainId
params.summary: Id of the target Starknet network
params.description: Id of the target Starknet network (default to Starknet Goerli Testnet)

result.name: result
result.description: Response from Starknet’s "gateway/add_transaction" endpoint

methods.name: starkNet_recoverAccounts
methods.summary: Recovers deployed user accounts from the seed phrase of MetaMask based on BIP-44

params.name: startScanIndex
params.summary: Starting address index of the derived key in BIP-44
params.description: Starting address index of the derived key in BIP-44 (default to 0)

params.name: maxScanned
params.summary: Maximum number of addresses to scan during the recovery process
params.description: Maximum number of addresses to scan during the recovery process (default to 1)

params.name: maxMissed
params.summary: Maximum number of uninitialized addresses hit during the recovery process
params.description: Maximum number of uninitialized addresses (i.e. account with no signer) hit during the recovery process (default to 1)

params.name: chainId
params.summary: Id of the target Starknet network
params.description: Id of the target Starknet network (default to Starknet Goerli Testnet)

result.name: result
result.summary: List of the scanned user accounts during the recovery process
result.description: List of the scanned user accounts during the recovery process

methods.name: starkNet_getTransactions
methods.summary: Gets the transaction records from a sender address
methods.description: Gets the transaction records from a sender address

params.name: senderAddress
params.summary: Address of the sender
params.description: Address of the sender

params.name: contractAddress
params.summary: Address of the called contract
params.description: Address of the called contract

params.name: pageSize
params.summary: Page size when calling the Voyager get "api/txns" endpoint
params.description: Page size when calling the Voyager get "api/txns" endpoint (default to 10, and only 10, 25, 50 is effective)

params.name: txnsInLastNumOfDays
params.summary: Number of past days of transaction records to be fetched from Voyager
params.description: Number of past days of transaction records to be fetched from Voyager (default to 5)

params.name: withDeployTxn
params.summary: Indicate whether to include the deploy transaction of the sender’s account contract
params.description: Indicate whether to include the deploy transaction of the sender’s account contract (default to false)

params.name: onlyFromState
params.summary: Indicate whether to only retrieve transaction records that are stored in snap state
params.description: Indicate whether to only retrieve transaction records that are stored in snap state, i.e. those in "RECEIVED", "PENDING", "ACCEPTED_ON_L2", and "REJECTED" state (default to false)

params.name: chainId
params.summary: Id of the target Starknet network
params.description: Id of the target Starknet network (default to Starknet Goerli Testnet)

result.name: result
result.description: List of the transaction records

methods.name: starkNet_addErc20Token

params.description: Name of the ERC-20 token (no longer than 64 ASCII characters and can't be all spaces)

params.summary: Symbol of the ERC-20 token (no longer than 16 ASCII characters and can't be all spaces)
params.description: Symbol of the ERC-20 token

params.name: tokenDecimals

params.description: Number of decimals for the ERC-20 token unit (default to 18)

params.name: chainId
params.summary: Id of the target Starknet network
params.description: Id of the target Starknet network (default to Starknet Goerli Testnet)

result.name: result
result.summary: Object of the added ERC-20 token
result.description: Object of the added ERC-20 token

NUM_AS_HEX.title: An integer number in hex format (0x...)

PROTOCOL_VERSION.title: protocolVersion
PROTOCOL_VERSION.description: Starknet protocol version, given in hex representation.

CHAIN_ID.title: chainId
CHAIN_ID.description: Starknet chain id, given in hex representation.

ETH_ADDRESS.description: an ethereum address represented as 40 hex digits

TXN_HASH.description: The transaction hash, as assigned in Starknet
TXN_HASH.title: A transaction's hash

CLASS_HASH.description: The class hash, as assigned in Starknet
CLASS_HASH.title: A class's hash

FELT.title: Field element
FELT.$comment: A field element, represented as a string of hex digits
FELT.description: A field element. Represented as up to 63 hex digits and leading 4 bits zeroed.

TXN_STATUS.description: The status of the transaction. May be unknown in case node is not aware of it

VOYAGER_TXN_TYPE.description: The txn type of the transaction from Voyager. May not be a full list here and subject to change

VOYAGER_TXN_STATUS.description: The status of the transaction. May be unknown in case node is not aware of it

address.description: Address of the ERC-20 token contract

image.description: Image URL of the ERC-20 token

decimals.description: Number of decimals for the ERC-20 token unit

chainId.description: Id of the Starknet network where the token resides

addressIndex.description: Address index of BIP-44 of the user account

publicKey.description: Public key of the user account (empty if the account has no signer)

addressSalt.description: Address salt used when creating the user account

deployTxnHash.description: Hash of the deploy transaction of the user account

derivationPath.description: BIP-44 derivation path used wjem creating the user account

chainId.description: Id of the Starknet network where the token resides

baseUrl.description: Base URL of the "feeder" and "feeder_gateway" API endpoints

nodeUrl.description: Node URL of the JSON-RPC node API endpoints

voyagerUrl.description: Base URL of the Voyager API endpoints for retrieving transaction records

accountClassHash.description: Class hash for deploying user accounts in the network

contractCallData.description: Call data for the called contract function

failureReason.description: Failed reason if the txn was rejected

eventIds.description: List of ID of events emitted as part of this transaction

chainId.description: Id of the Starknet network where the txn submitted to

address.description: The address of the deploying account

suggestedMaxFee.description: Estimated gas fee with overhead added in decimal string

overallFee.description: Overall gas fee in decimal string

gasConsumed.description: Total amount of consumed gas in decimal string

gasPrice.description: Price for each gas unit in decimal string

includeDeploy.description: Indicate whether deploy txn is included (for first send txn)

suggestedMaxFee.description: Estimated gas fee with overhead added in decimal string

overallFee.description: Overall gas fee in decimal string

gasConsumed.description: Total amount of consumed gas in decimal string

gasPrice.description: Price for each gas unit in decimal string
